author: cms-sw
body:
Split gperf tools
- gperf_interface: To provide the tool interface e.g include and lib paths
- gperf_profiler: to link against gperf profiler lib
- gperf_tcmalloc_and_profiler: to link against gperf tcmalloc_and_profiler lib
title: added gperf profiler and tcmalloc_and_profiler tools
